chapters.title: Prologue: By Grace and Banners Fallen
chapters.info: Nakomi, p. 47—Aiel with furrowed skin. Aviendha encountered her on her way to Rhuidean in the Three-fold Land. She wore Aiel garb; not cadinsor, not Wise One garb, just normal clothes. Aviendha did not know what to make of her. Bair said Nakomi is an ancient name; no one has used it in Bair's memory.
